articles.description: Ramsey played Officer Laverne Hooks in the Police Academy movies and was one of the singers who inspired the original Broadway show Dreamgirls.
articles.content:
Marion Ramsey, star of the Police Academy film franchise, died on Thursday in her home in Los Angeles, Calif., EW has confirmed. She was 73.
